name: Ahsan Manzil
description: Ahsan Manzil used to be the official residential palace and seat of the Nawab of Dhaka. ... The building is situated at Kumartoli along the banks of the Buriganga.

name: Narsunda Lake City
description: Narsunda Lake City, Kishorganj. Kishorganj is a place of the creed of respectively Sanatana and Loukik Islam. Both Meghna and Brahmaputra river have contributed.

name: Mosque of Bagerhat
description: The Historic Mosque City of Bagerhat is an important evidence of medieval city in the south-west part of present Bagerhat district which is located in the south

name: Lalbagh kella
description: During the height of the Mughal Empire, in 1677, Prince Muhammad Azam commissioned the construction of Lalbagh Fort, but the project was never completed.

name: Longest-sea-beach
description: Cox's Bazar in Bangladesh is the world's longest natural sea beach, and a popular tourist destination in the country.

name: Sunamganj-lack
description: Sunamganj (Bengali: সুনামগঞ্জ) is a district located in north-eastern Bangladesh within the Sylhet Division.

name: Tea-Garden-Sylhet
description: A visit to the tea plantation in Sylhet would be the memorable experience for any one. The gardens are relics from the days of the British Raj.

name: Amiakhum
description: Amiakhum is my second most favorite waterfall in the whole of the country. It is located deep within the hills. Roughtly a day and half walk away from Remakri.

name: Saint-Martin
description: Saint Martin (French: Saint-Martin; Dutch: Sint Maarten) is an island in the northeast Caribbean Sea, approximately 300 km (190 mi) east of Puerto Rico.
